languages.text: "Нечестные слова. Ритуал отказа от бремени стер меня. Сделал пустой. Если у меня и была воля... ты лишил меня ее. И заполнил своей".

traits.locale_text: "Ты можешь говорить что угодно — я не помню тех дней. Ибо ритуал Ю'шин был исполнен. Ты стер меня. Сделал меня пустой. Если у меня однажды и была воля... ты лишил меня ее. И заполнил своей".

languages.text: "Your words are dishonest. The ritual of releasing the burden erased me. Made me hollow. What will of my own I had... you took from me. And filled me with yours instead."
languages.original_text: "Нечестные слова. Ритуал отказа от бремени стер меня. Сделал пустой. Если у меня и была воля... ты лишил меня ее. И заполнил своей".

traits.locale_text: "These words are dishonest. The Yuh'shin ritual erased me. Made me hollow. What will of my own I had... you took away from me. And filled me with yours instead."
"These words are dishonest. The Yuh'shin ritual erased me. Made me hollow. What will of my own I had... you took away from me. And filled me with yours instead."
"Your words are dishonest. The ritual of releasing the burden erased me. Made me hollow. What will of my own I had... you took from me. And filled me with yours instead."
"Your words are dishonest. The ritual of releasing the burden erased me. Made me hollow. What will of my own I had... you took from me. And filled me with yours instead."
"Your words are dishonest. The ritual of releasing the burden erased me. Made me hollow. What will of my own I had... you took from me. And filled me with yours instead."
"Your words are dishonest. The ritual of releasing the burden erased me. Made me hollow. What will of my own I had... you took from me. And filled me with yours instead."

languages.text: « Mensonges que tout cela. Le rituel de renoncement a effacé celle que j'étais. Il m'a vidée de ma substance. Cette volonté qui m'était propre... vous m'en avez dépossédée pour mieux m'imposer la vôtre. »
languages.original_text: "Your words are dishonest. The ritual of releasing the burden erased me. Made me hollow. What will of my own I had... you took from me. And filled me with yours instead."

traits.locale_text: « Mensonges que tout cela. Le rituel de renoncement a effacé celle que j'étais. Il m'a vidée de ma substance. Cette volonté qui m'était propre... vous m'en avez dépossédée pour mieux m'imposer la vôtre. »

languages.text: «Miente. El ritual para liberar toda carga eliminó mi esencia. Me volvió un cascarón. La poca voluntad propia que tuviera... me la arrebató. Me insufló la suya propia en su lugar».
languages.original_text: "Your words are dishonest. The ritual of releasing the burden erased me. Made me hollow. What will of my own I had... you took from me. And filled me with yours instead."

traits.locale_text: «Miente. El ritual para liberar toda carga eliminó mi esencia. Me volvió un cascarón. La poca voluntad propia que tuviera... me la arrebató. Me insufló la suya propia en su lugar».

languages.text: 「あなたの言葉には誠意がありません。解放の儀式は我というものを消し去り、虚ろな存在にした。そこにあった自分の意志を…あなたは奪った。そして代わりに、あなたの意志で満たした」
languages.original_text: "Your words are dishonest. The ritual of releasing the burden erased me. Made me hollow. What will of my own I had... you took from me. And filled me with yours instead."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの言葉には誠意がありません。解放の儀式は我というものを消し去り、虚ろな存在にした。そこにあった自分の意志を…あなたは奪った。そして代わりに、あなたの意志で満たした」

languages.text: “你的话语并不诚实。血缚得脱仪式抹除了我的存在，消灭了我的意识。我原本拥有自己的意志……而你却夺走了我的一切，用你自己的思想将我填满。”
languages.original_text: "Your words are dishonest. The ritual of releasing the burden erased me. Made me hollow. What will of my own I had... you took from me. And filled me with yours instead."

traits.locale_text: “你的话语并不诚实。血缚得脱仪式抹除了我的存在，消灭了我的意识。我原本拥有自己的意志……而你却夺走了我的一切，用你自己的思想将我填满。”

languages.text: "Eure Worte sind unehrlich. Das Ritual zur Linderung der Last hat mich ausgelöscht. Hat mich hohl gemacht. Das bisschen eigenen Willen, das ich besaß ... habt Ihr mir genommen. Und mich stattdessen mit dem Euren gefüllt."
languages.original_text: "Your words are dishonest. The ritual of releasing the burden erased me. Made me hollow. What will of my own I had... you took from me. And filled me with yours instead."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Worte sind unehrlich. Das Ritual zur Linderung der Last hat mich ausgelöscht. Hat mich hohl gemacht. Das bisschen eigenen Willen, das ich besaß ... habt Ihr mir genommen. Und mich stattdessen mit dem Euren gefüllt."

languages.text: "Sözlerinde dürüstlükten eser yok. Yükten azat ayini, hatıralarımı sildi. Beni bomboş bıraktı. Sahip olduğum ne arzu varsa... Hepsini elimden aldın ve beni kendininkilerle doldurdun."
languages.original_text: "Your words are dishonest. The ritual of releasing the burden erased me. Made me hollow. What will of my own I had... you took from me. And filled me with yours instead."
